quotes.message: Virtue and decency are so nearly related that it is difficult to separate them from each other but in our imagination.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: When the norm is decency, other virtues can thrive: integrity, honesty, compassion, kindness, and trust.
quotes.name: Raja Krishnamoorthi

quotes.message: Human decency is not derived from religion. It precedes it.
quotes.name: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.message: Decency is the least of all laws, but yet it is the law which is most strictly observed.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Ethics, decency and morality are the real soldiers.
quotes.name: Kiran Bedi

quotes.message: Decency is judged by our actions not by our words.
quotes.name: Abdulazeez Henry Musa

quotes.message: Decency cannot be discussed without indecency!
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Decency requires that when a programme is approved by the majority, all should carry it out faithfully.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: There are those without decency who must be fought without hesitation, without pity.
quotes.name: Henri

quotes.message: There's a sort of decency among the dead, a remarkable discretion: you never find them making any complaint against the doctor who killed them!
quotes.name: Moliere

quotes.message: Decency renders all things tolerable.
quotes.name: Joseph Marie

quotes.message: Small acts of decency ripple in ways we could never imagine.
quotes.name: Cory Booker

quotes.message: One must think like a hero to behave like a merely decent human being.
quotes.name: May Sarton

quotes.message: Decency is not news. It is buried in the obituaries, but it is a force stronger than crime.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: Justice consists of doing no one injury, decency in giving no one offense.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: In some ways, 'decency' is a hazy concept; we know it when we see it.
quotes.name: Raja Krishnamoorthi

quotes.message: Decency must be an even more exhausting state to maintain than its opposite. Those who succeed seem to need a stupefying amount of sleep.
quotes.name: Quentin Crisp

quotes.message: Want of decency is want of sense.
quotes.name: Wentworth Dillon

quotes.message: Silence is not weakness and decency is not pride.
quotes.name: Arthur Machen

quotes.message: Decency and tolerance, to be of any value, must be capable of withstanding the severest strain.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: The thin and precarious crust of decency is all that separates any civilization, however impressive, from the hell of anarchy or systematic tyranny which lie in wait beneath the surface .
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: There is a sense of decency that's like a barometer to a man's or a country's health.
quotes.name: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.message: God's most lordly gift to man is decency of mind.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: Decency, not to dare to do that in public which it is decent enough to do in private.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: Decency is not defined, by statute, but the laws of instinct are stronger.
quotes.name: Charles Pinot Duclos

quotes.message: Morals are private. Decency is public.
quotes.name: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.message: Decency is such a rare thing in this world, and it can only be repaid with loyalty.
quotes.name: Mike Klepper

quotes.message: Acts of sacrifice and decency without regard to what's in it for you create ripple effects. Ones that lift up families and communities, that spread opportunity and boost our economy.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: Common decency is a core part of who people are.
quotes.name: E. J. Dionne

quotes.message: Morals are a matter of private agreement; decency is of public concern.
quotes.name: Marguerite Yourcenar

quotes.message: The measure of a decent human being is how he or she treats the defenseless.
quotes.name: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.message: The laws of decency enforce themselves.
quotes.name: Louise Colet

quotes.message: Decency is indecency's conspiracy of silence.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Don't overestimate the decency of the human race.
quotes.name: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.message: Breaking of norms and disregard for decency have huge, long-term costs.
quotes.name: Tom Steyer

quotes.message: If you can't say anything nice, at least have the decency to be vague.
quotes.name: Susan Andersen
